actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve the enrollment of retiring individuals in the Medicare program.
short_title: Healthcare Enrollment Reform Modernization and Navigation Act

summary.text:
Healthcare Enrollment Reform Modernization and Navigation Act

This bill establishes and otherwise modifies requirements relating to coordinated coverage between employer health insurance and Medicare.

Specifically, the bill prohibits employer-sponsored health plans for certain smaller employers from reducing benefits for employees who are eligible for Medicare but have not yet enrolled.

titles.title: Healthcare Enrollment Reform Modernization and Navigation Act
Healthcare Enrollment Reform Modernization and Navigation Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve the enrollment of retiring individuals in the Medicare program.
